alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Northwest Plateau; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 13 at 2:17AM MDT until June 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains, Northwest Plateau and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. Areas of blowing dust may limit visibility to 3 miles or less at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Northwest Plateau; West Central Plateau
